articles.title: Amtrak, automakers vow to work with future Biden administration - Fox Business
articles.description: U.S. transit and airline demand has been devastated by the coronavirus pandemic
articles.content:
U.S. passenger railroad Amtrak and American automakers on Saturday pledged to work with the incoming administration of Democrat Joe Biden, who wants to boost mass transit and green vehicles.
